tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE search_engine_content (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE search_results (
    search_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    relevance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (search_id) REFERENCES search_history(search_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES documents(document_id)
);
